BREAKING: Illinois Secretary of State Sues Kristi Noem & ICE Over "Illegal" License Plate Swaps

Illinois is taking a stand. Secretary of State Alexi Giannoulias has officially announced a federal lawsuit against DHS Secretary Kristi Noem, ICE, and CBP. The allegation? Federal agents have been caught illegally swapping and altering license plates to hide their identities during enforcement operations in Illinois.

In this video, we break down the explosive details of the lawsuit, the "Plate Watch Hotline" discovery, and why Giannoulias says "no one is above the law"—not even federal agents.

snippet.title: Das schleppe ich mit mir rum! (E1.02) #hamradio #parksontheair #draussenfunker
snippet.description:
➥ BEYOND THE SCHACK: Du hast dich schon immer gefragt, was man alles für das Funken in der Natur braucht? Dann schau' mal her. In dieser Folge zeige ich dir einen kleinen ersten Einblick in meinen Funkrucksack. Natürlich ist noch Platz für mehr und du kannst dir sicherlich denken, dass noch mehr drin steckt. Bleib also dran, und ich gebe dir eine detaillierte Übersicht über die Dinge, die ich nutze und immer dabei habe.

▬ Über diesen Kanal ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

Du findest hier bei "Mum, I am outside", wie du sicherlich schon mitbekommen hast, einen etwas anderen Blick auf den Amateurfunk. Ich möchte dir hier keine Funkgeräte, keine Antennen oder anderes Zeug aus dem Kosmos des Amateurfunk vorstellen. Ebenso wirst du hier nichts Wissenswertes zu sehr wohl interessanten Themen des Amateurfunks sehen.
Was ich aber möchte, ist, dich auf eine Reise mitzunehmen, die dir zeigt was Amateurfunk heute sein kann: atemberaubend schön, unfassbar ruhig, tief entspannend, körperlich aktiv und offen für alles.

▬ Weitere Amateurfunk Infos ▬▬▬▬▬

➥ Wenn du dich für das Thema Amateurfunk interessierst, dann findest du hier alle nötigen Informationen wie du Funkamateur wirst: https://www.50ohm.de

➥ Suchst du Anschluss, brauchst das persönliche Gespräch oder möchtest einfach nur mal reinschnuppern? Auch im Amateurfunk hast du die Möglichkeit in Verein aktiv zu werden.

Hier findest du zwei der größten Vereine in Deutschland und mit Sicherheit auch in deiner Nähe:
https://www.darc.de
https://www.vfdb.org

➥ Du bist Funkamateur und hast Bock auf Betrieb in der Natur? Hier findest du einen kleinen Wegeplan zum Thema, an dem du dich entlang hangeln kannst.

Ein guter Start ins Thema ist die größte deutschsprachige Draußenfunker Community. Hier findest du einen unkomplizierten und schnellen Einstieg mit allen wichtigen Infos.
https://www.draussenfunker.de

Die zwei großen Aktivitätsprogramme, an denen ich selbst teilnehme:
https://pota.app (Parks on the Air)
https://www.sota.org.uk (Summits on the Air)

snippet.title: POTA Fans: Exciting New Ham Radio Portable Program - Lakes & Lagoons On The Air!
snippet.description:
Discover Lakes and Lagoons On The Air (LLOTA), an innovative portable ham radio activation program from Chile that's taking the amateur radio community by storm!

If you're a POTA enthusiast looking for your next challenge, LLOTA offers a refreshing alternative—activating stunning lakes, lagoons, reservoirs, and dams around the world.

What is LLOTA?
A new "On The Air" program designed to promote amateur radio operations from beautiful aquatic environments while emphasizing environmental stewardship and respect for nature.

Quick Facts:
✅ Minimum 10 QSOs required for valid activation
✅ Operate within 200 meters of water's edge (or even ON the water!)
✅ All amateur bands and modes permitted (SSB, CW, Digital, FM Simplex)
✅ Self-spotting allowed via live cluster
✅ 30-day log submission window
✅ Open to activators and hunters worldwide

Key Features:
• Unique waterside locations for portable operations
• Real-time cluster for spotting active references
• Points and awards system for achievements
• International participation welcomed
• Flexible operating positions, including bridges and boats
• Strong environmental conservation focus

Getting Started:
Visit https://llota.app/ to register, explore references, and join the community. Review the complete rules at https://llota.app/reglas.html before your first activation.

Important: Operators are solely responsible for safety, permissions, and weather conditions. Research your reference thoroughly before heading out!

Ready to make waves in portable ham radio? Grab your rig and head to the nearest lake or lagoon for an unforgettable operating experience!

73 and good DX from the waterside! 🌊📻

#HamRadio #AmateurRadio #LLOTA #PortableOperations #POTA #LakesOnTheAir

snippet.title: How To Become A Pharmacy Technician In Washington State?
snippet.description:
How To Become A Pharmacy Technician In Washington State?

To become a Pharmacy Technician in Washington State, you must first be at least 18 years old and possess a high school diploma or GED. The primary pathway involves completing a pharmacy technician training program approved by the Washington State Pharmacy Quality Assurance Commission. Alternatively, you can qualify by documenting 500 hours of pharmacy-related experience, often gained through an externship or supervised on-the-job training. After meeting the education or experience requirement, the next crucial step is passing a national certification exam, such as the Pharmacy Technician Certification Exam (PTCE) offered by PTCB or the ExCPT exam by NHA. Once nationally certified, you must apply for licensure with the Washington State Board of Pharmacy. This application typically includes a background check and requires submitting proof of your national certification and fulfilled education/experience requirements. Maintaining your license necessitates ongoing continuing education and timely renewals.

🔎 Helpful Links & Resources
• Video Link: https://youtu.be/R3xM4mDQOrQ
• Channel Link: https://www.youtube.com/@CountyPortal/?sub_confirmation=1

snippet.title: Все будет хуже. Мы - пример, как не надо жить. Санкции, это положительно. Россияне о ценах на нефть
snippet.description:
Доходы российского бюджета от нефти и газа по итогам января составят 420 млрд рублей и сократятся на 46% по сравнению с январем прошлого года, пишет Reuters.

Это самый низкий показатель с августа 2020 года, когда на спрос на топливо упал из-за пандемии коронавируса, отмечает агентство. При этом на нефтегазовые доходы сейчас приходится около четверти всех поступлений в российский бюджет.

Расчеты основаны на данных о добыче нефти и газа в России, а также их переработке и поставках на внутреннем и внешнем рынках.

️Одной из причин падения доходов стало снижение цен на российскую нефть: в декабре она упала на 53% по сравнению с декабрем 2024 года и достигла 3073 рублей за баррель.

Российские власти также признавали падение доходов от нефти. В декабре, по данным Минфина, они сократились до 447,8 млрд рублей (по сравнению с 790,2 млрд рублей в 2024 году).

С первого февраля Евросоююз также снизит потолок цен на российскую нефть с 47,6 до 44,1 доллара за баррель. Западные государства приняли решение установить предельную цену на российскую сырую нефть из-за полномасштабной войны России против Украины.

Изначально, в декабре 2022 года, потолок цен был установлен на уровне 60 долларов за баррель, с сентября 2025 года его понизили до 47,6 доллара.

localized.title: Все будет хуже. Мы - пример, как не надо жить. Санкции, это положительно. Россияне о ценах на нефть
localized.description:
Доходы российского бюджета от нефти и газа по итогам января составят 420 млрд рублей и сократятся на 46% по сравнению с январем прошлого года, пишет Reuters.

Это самый низкий показатель с августа 2020 года, когда на спрос на топливо упал из-за пандемии коронавируса, отмечает агентство. При этом на нефтегазовые доходы сейчас приходится около четверти всех поступлений в российский бюджет.

Расчеты основаны на данных о добыче нефти и газа в России, а также их переработке и поставках на внутреннем и внешнем рынках.

️Одной из причин падения доходов стало снижение цен на российскую нефть: в декабре она упала на 53% по сравнению с декабрем 2024 года и достигла 3073 рублей за баррель.

Российские власти также признавали падение доходов от нефти. В декабре, по данным Минфина, они сократились до 447,8 млрд рублей (по сравнению с 790,2 млрд рублей в 2024 году).

С первого февраля Евросоююз также снизит потолок цен на российскую нефть с 47,6 до 44,1 доллара за баррель. Западные государства приняли решение установить предельную цену на российскую сырую нефть из-за полномасштабной войны России против Украины.

Изначально, в декабре 2022 года, потолок цен был установлен на уровне 60 долларов за баррель, с сентября 2025 года его понизили до 47,6 доллара.

snippet.title: Are External ATUs Better?
snippet.description:
Most modern Ham Radio HF Transceivers have internal ATUs, or to be correct, Antenna Matching Units. But there is still a healthy choice of external units. In this Video, Peter G3OJV, examines the advantages that may justify the purchase of an external matching unit.

snippet.title: CAP I POTA (Callos)🐮🔥
snippet.description:
RECETA
Ingredientes
🧅2u cebollas
🧄5u dientes de ajo
🍅3u tomates maduros
🥃1u vaso brandy
🥩1kg cap i pota
🥩150gr chorizo
🥓150gr panceta
🍵1,5L caldo carne
🌶1u cucharada pimentón dulce
🌶️1u cayena
🍃2u hojas de laurel
🫒Aceite de oliva virgen extra
🧂Sal y pimienta

ELABORACIÓN
1️⃣Corta la panceta a tiras y en una olla con aceite de oliva pon a sofreir la panceta hastaque esté bien dorada y reserva
2️⃣Corta la cebolla y el ajo bien fino y en la misma olla pon las verduras a rehogar durante 30 minutos
3️⃣Corta el tomate a groso modo, tritura con ayuda de un turmix y añade a la olla 
4️⃣Cuando el agua del tomate esté bien resucido, vierte el brandy y deja reducir el alcohol por completo
5️⃣Añade el pimentón dulce, las cayenas, la panceta y mezcla todo bien
6️⃣Seguidamente añade la cap i pota y sigue mezclando para integrar bien todos los ingredientes
7️⃣Vierte el caldo de carne y deja cocinar a fuego mínimo durante 30 minutos 
8️⃣Los últimos 10 minutos de cocción, añade el chorizo y rectificar de sal y pimienta si fuera necesario
9️⃣Último paso, disfrutar de este platazo😍🤤

TE HA GUSTADO LA RECETA⁉️
Si tienes alguna duda puedes dejar un comentario aquí abajo🤗

Join me for a fun operating event — Winter Field Day. Whether you’re a seasoned operator or brand new to ham radio, this event is all about practicing emergency communication skills in winter conditions!

📡 What’s Happening?
We’ll be working ham radio stations from across North America. Watch the action unfold in real time as we log QSOs, chase sections, and rack up points. The exchange is simple:
Number of Operators, Category, Section.

💬 Get Involved!
Drop your questions in the chat, cheer us on, and share your own WFD setup. This is a great chance to learn about portable gear, emergency power, antennas, and real‑world operating.

snippet.title: Can I Renew My Pharmacy Tech License After It Expires?
snippet.description:
Can I Renew My Pharmacy Tech License After It Expires?

Yes, renewing an expired pharmacy technician license is generally possible, but the process varies significantly by state board of pharmacy and certifying body (e.g., PTCB, NHA). Most jurisdictions offer a reinstatement pathway, often with a grace period for licenses lapsed for a few months to a couple of years. The longer the license has been expired, the more complex and costly the process typically becomes. You will almost certainly face additional fees beyond standard renewal costs and be required to complete all outstanding continuing education (CE) credits that accumulated during the lapsed period. Some states might even require extra CEs or a re-examination, especially for prolonged expirations. It is crucial to contact your specific state board of pharmacy and certification body directly to understand their exact requirements for reinstatement. They will provide the definitive steps, forms, and fees. Prompt action is always advised, as extensive expiration could necessitate reapplying as a new applicant rather than a simple renewal or reinstatement.

🔎 Helpful Links & Resources
• Video Link: https://youtu.be/koFPJHbIhYg
• Channel Link: https://www.youtube.com/@CountyPortal/?sub_confirmation=1

snippet.title: Get Started with POTA the Easy Way - Hunting!
snippet.description:
Want to get into Parks on the Air without leaving your hamshack? This video shows you exactly how to hunt POTA—find activators, tune to their frequency, and make your first POTA contact with confidence.

We’ll cover what POTA hunting is, the basic equipment you need, and how to use the World Radio League (WRL) logger to spot activators and log contacts fast (including auto-filling park numbers from spots). You’ll also learn proper on-air etiquette for pileups, plus CW tips if you’re hunting Morse code activators.

Chapters
00:00 Introduction to POTA Hunting
00:26 What is POTA Hunting? (Hunters vs Activators)
01:08 Licensing & equipment basics (Tech vs General)
02:45 Using WRL Logger for POTA hunting (setup + logbooks)
04:25 Understanding POTA spots (what each field means)
06:35 Filtering spots + bands/modes (including Tech-friendly options)
07:45 Making contact with an activator (timing + pileups)
10:21 Typical voice exchange example (CQ / QRZ)
13:12 What to log (park numbers + contact details)
14:22 Hunting CW activators (Morse basics + etiquette)
17:11 CW exchange example + learning resources
19:14 Logging contacts + RST signal reports (WRL tips)
20:46 Submitting logs & tracking hunter stats (pota.app)
22:22 More stats inside WRL (activities + park metrics)
22:54 Best practices + advanced tips (templates, CAT control, multi-op notes)
24:30 More learning resources (courses + next steps)
25:00 Conclusion

If you’re new to HF and want an easy, fun way to build operating skills, POTA hunting is one of the best places to start.

👉 Learn portable operating and licensing at https://www.HamRadioPrep.com
👉 Log your contacts and activations at https://www.WorldRadioLeague.com

snippet.title: How To Get A Pharmacy Tech License in Florida?
snippet.description:
How To Get A Pharmacy Tech License in Florida?

To obtain a Pharmacy Technician license in Florida, aspiring technicians must meet several requirements set by the Florida Board of Pharmacy. First, applicants must be at least 17 years old and possess a high school diploma or GED, or be currently enrolled in high school. Alternatively, completion of a pharmacy technician training program approved by the Florida Board of Pharmacy or one offered by the U.S. Armed Forces satisfies the education requirement. The next crucial step involves submitting a comprehensive application to the Florida Board of Pharmacy, accompanied by the required application fee. A mandatory Level 2 criminal background check, requiring fingerprint submission, is also part of the process to ensure public safety. Furthermore, applicants must not have any disqualifying felony or misdemeanor convictions related to the practice of pharmacy. Once all these conditions are met and approved, the license will be issued, allowing individuals to practice as a pharmacy technician in Florida.

🔎 Helpful Links & Resources
• Video Link: https://youtu.be/CHhawho9c8o
• Channel Link: https://www.youtube.com/@CountyPortal/?sub_confirmation=1

snippet.title: Why Buying a Big Three Rig Makes No Sense in 2026 | Hans Summers Explains
snippet.description:
Hans Summers is a QRP Hall of Fame inductee, founder of QRP Labs, and one of the most influential innovators in modern amateur radio.

In this wide-ranging interview, Hans makes a compelling case for why the traditional “Big Three” transceiver manufacturers are no longer the obvious choice for radio amateurs. We explore why software-defined radio (SDR) and polar modulation represent a fundamental shift in how transmitters should be designed, built, and bought.

Hans explains how polar modulation delivers dramatically higher efficiency, reduced component stress, and lower cost, while opening the door to simpler hardware and cleaner RF performance. This approach challenges decades of conventional radio design and raises serious questions about whether heavyweight, power-hungry analogue rigs still make sense in 2026 and beyond.

Topics covered in this interview include:
 • Why the classic Big Three radio model is showing its age
 • The real advantages of SDR over traditional architectures
 • What polar modulation is and why it matters
 • Efficiency, cost, and performance trade-offs in modern transceivers
 • How innovation in amateur radio is increasingly coming from small, focused engineers rather than large corporations
 • What the next generation of HF radios could and should look like

This conversation is not about brand-bashing. It’s about engineering reality, value for money, and waking up to what modern technology makes possible.

If you’re considering your next HF rig, curious about the future of amateur radio, or wondering whether it’s time to rethink long-held assumptions, this interview will change how you look at radio.

#hamradio #cb #radio #icom #hobby #flexradio #swl #kenwood #yaesu #pota #tech

snippet.title: Anatomy And Physiology | Lab License Preparation | NHPC
snippet.description:
Smart Academy presents Anatomy and Physiology Lab License Preparation (DR.NRR), a concept-based and exam-oriented program designed for candidates appearing in the NHPC Laboratory License Examination. This course focuses on detailed understanding of human body structure and function, helping students link theoretical knowledge with laboratory and clinical relevance.

With expert guidance, structured notes, and regular question-discussion sessions, students build strong fundamentals and gain confidence to successfully clear the lab license exam.

snippet.title: 1 Watt to ANTARCTICA 😱 | QDX Digital Ham Radio Magic #shorts #viral #hamradio #qrp
snippet.description:
1 WATT.
15 METERS.
ANTARCTICA.

This still blows my mind 🤯
Using the QDX digital transceiver from QRP Labs, running just 1 watt on the 15m band, I made contact 15,651 km away — all the way to Antarctica.

This is why I love QRP and digital modes.
Tiny power. Massive reach. Real radio magic.

👉 Watch it LIVE right now on my 24/7 ham radio stream
I’m running experiments, live digital contacts, antenna tests, and real-time QRP fun around the clock.

73

snippet.title: Day 2b - 2026 Winter Field Day LIVE with AF0F!
snippet.description:
🎙️ Live from the Shack: Winter Field Day 2026!
Join me for a fun operating event — Winter Field Day. Whether you’re a seasoned operator or brand new to ham radio, this event is all about practicing emergency communication skills in winter conditions!

📡 What’s Happening?
We’ll be working ham radio stations from across North America. Watch the action unfold in real time as we log QSOs, chase sections, and rack up points. The exchange is simple:
Number of Operators, Category, Section.

💬 Get Involved!
Drop your questions in the chat, cheer us on, and share your own WFD setup. This is a great chance to learn about portable gear, emergency power, antennas, and real‑world operating.

🎯 Goals for This Year:
✅ Make as many contacts as possible
✅ Test the shack setup for winter reliability
✅ Have fun and connect with the ham community — including you here in the stream

🔔 Don’t forget to subscribe and hit the bell so you won’t miss future ham radio adventures.

If you have any questions, drop them in the chat or comments!
Michael, AF0F
@HeartlandHamRadio

snippet.title: How Do Vet Techs Get Licensed?
snippet.description:
Dreaming of a career where you directly impact animal health? Becoming a veterinary technician is incredibly rewarding, but it requires a clear path to qualification and recognition. This video breaks down exactly how vet techs get licensed.

In this video, you'll discover:
 ► The fundamental three-step process to becoming a licensed vet tech, from education to state certification.
 ► Why accreditation by the AVMA is crucial for your educational program.
 ► The importance and scope of the Veterinary Technician National Examination (VTNE) for nationwide competence.
 ► How state-specific requirements, including jurisprudence exams and continuing education, factor into your licensure.
 ► The professional growth opportunities that open up once you are a credentialed veterinary technician.


#VetTechLicensing, #AnimalCareJobs, #VeterinaryTechnician, #VetTechSchool, #AVMA, #VTNE, #CareerInAnimals

snippet.title: Coax for POTA: The Hose Between Your Radio and the Antenna
snippet.description:
Coax is one of the most misunderstood parts of a POTA setup — and it’s time to simplify it.

In this stream, we break down coax for Parks on the Air using plain language and real-world field experience. No lab talk, no spec-sheet flexing — just what actually matters when you’re activating from a park.

We’ll cover:

What coax really does (and what it doesn’t)

Why coax takes more abuse in the field than in your shack

Common myths like “you need premium coax to activate” and “LMR-400 makes you louder”

Why the antenna matters more than the coax

When it actually makes sense to upgrade — and when it absolutely doesn’t

If you already own coax that works, this stream has one clear message:
GO ACTIVATE.

This is a practical, no-nonsense POTA discussion aimed at helping you spend less time worrying about gear — and more time making contacts.


*************************************************************
Welcome to Brew & Activate! I’m genuinely thrilled to have you with me every Friday morning as we embark on exciting conversations about Parks on the Air (POTA) and related topics. Together, we will explore everything from gear and antennas to setups, including those aspects that might initially seem less thrilling!

snippet.title: What do pilots actually study?
snippet.description:
Before you become a pilot, 
you have to clear these exams.

Without them,
you cannot get a commercial pilot licence.

Here’s what pilots actually study 👇

1️⃣ Air Regulations
Rules of flying. What you can and can’t do.

2️⃣ Meteorology
Weather. Clouds. Wind. Storms.

3️⃣ Navigation
Direction, distance, time.
How to find your way in the sky.

4️⃣ Technical General
How planes fly.
Engines. Systems. Aerodynamics.

5️⃣ Technical Specific
Depends on the aircraft you fly
(Cessna, Diamond, etc.)

6️⃣ RTR
Radio communication.
How pilots talk to Air Traffic Control.

That’s it.
Six subjects. One step at a time.

Clear these,
and you’re officially on the path to the cockpit.

snippet.title: HOA Tried to Silence My Ham Radio… So I Made Them Regret It Legally  #hoastories
snippet.description:
My HOA banned my ham radio antenna for “visual pollution.”
They thought they could force me to remove it without consequences.

So I documented every notice, every threat, and every violation of communication protections.
Then I filed formal complaints and triggered an investigation.

A few weeks later, their network issues exploded—38 professionals couldn’t work from home because of interference problems tied to their own setup.

They tried to silence my signal…
but all they did was expose their own mess.
🔥 Watch till the end
💬 Comment “Property Rights” if you believe rules must be applied fairly

snippet.title: General Medicine | Smart Academy Lab License Preparation Class | NHPC
snippet.description:
Smart Academy presents a comprehensive General Medicine Lab License Preparation Class designed for students preparing for Lab/HA License Examinations. This course focuses on building strong clinical understanding of common medical conditions, diagnosis principles, laboratory correlations, and case-based learning essential for real-world practice and exams.

The classes are conducted by experienced instructors using exam-oriented notes, practical explanations, and frequent revision sessions. Emphasis is given to high-yield topics, previous exam patterns, and clear concept building to help students perform confidently in the license examination.

✨ Key Highlights:
✔️ Updated General Medicine Syllabus Coverage
✔️ Disease Overview with Lab Correlation
✔️ Diagnosis & Clinical Interpretation
✔️ Common Medical Disorders Simplified
✔️ Exam-Focused Notes & Quick Revisions
✔️ Previous License Question Discussions

✔️ Regular Practice & Evaluation Sessions

snippet.title: #145 - ¡Tenemos HF en el tendal!
snippet.description:
En este episodio de CQ en Frecuencia cuento la experiencia real de instalar una antena end-fed desde un piso, con el punto de alimentación en la ventana y el radiante separado de la fachada, y cómo pequeños detalles de colocación y retorno RF marcan enormes diferencias según la banda. Explico por qué el sistema rinde muy bien de 20 a 10 metros, cómo 40 metros es mucho más exigente y puede volverse “sordo” si no se cuida el contrapeso, y qué soluciones prácticas funcionan en un entorno urbano para mejorar el rendimiento y reducir RF en el shack sin obras ni instalaciones invasivas. Un episodio práctico para quien quiera sacar el máximo partido a una end-fed en condiciones reales de ciudad.
Además, charlo con EA1CJJ, Juan Vinagre, del grupo Radioafición Pontevedra, que este próximo jueves 29 de enero inician un ciclo de charlas sobre radioafición en Pontevedra abiertas a radioaficionados y aficionados a la radio.
¿Nos apoyas para que podamos seguir haciendo este podcast? Puedes apoyarnos en QRP con 1,99€ al mes o un poco más de potencia en QRO, con 5,99€ al mes aquí: https://cqenfrecuencia.com/apoyar/

snippet.title: My First SOTA Activation: 2m CW on Wilderness Peak
snippet.description:
First SOTA is in the books! Big thanks to all the chasers out there who helped make this happen. Getting my first contact on 2m with the modified quansheng was so cool!!

Huge shoutout to Devan, KM7ANM for letting me borrow the KX3! If I had spare daylight I would have spent way more time on 20m making contacts. 

SOTA: W7W/KG-132 Wilderness Peak

Thanks to Adam, K6ARK for making this video that helped me discover Summits on the Air over a year ago: https://youtu.be/cFHHdzRgd7U?si=kGRPOx-NFuJ3z55z
_____________________________________________________________________________
Gear used:

Radio Gear:
- Yaesu FT-60
- Quansheng UV-K6 IJV CW Mod: https://youtu.be/zi35aTjEppQ?si=eexvrMFPJmN5LX23
- Quansheng antenna: https://signalstuff.com/products/st-bnc/?band=2m70cm-dual-band&color=glow
- Palm Radio Pico Paddles 
- Elecraft KX3 (Thanks Devan!!)
- Elecraft AX1
- Mobile Logger: Ham2k Polo (the best one tbh) https://polo.ham2k.com/

Camera Gear:
- iPhone 17 Pro
- Blackmagic Camera App

From ham radio transceivers and CW paddles to antennas and power suppliers, there’s a lot to check out, so join Michael KI8R as he gives you a quick showcase of the exciting new Ham gear you’ll find at DXEngineering.com for January 2026.

snippet.title: What Are Veterinary Technician Licensure Requirements?
snippet.description:
Curious about becoming a licensed veterinary technician? This video breaks down the essential steps and requirements to kickstart your rewarding career in animal care and make a profound difference in the lives of animals.

Discover the key information you need to know:
 ► Learn about the core requirements for becoming a licensed veterinary technician (LVT), including education and exams.
 ► Understand why strict licensure standards are in place to uphold public health, safety, and professional competency.
 ► Find out how to research specific state requirements and navigate the application process effectively.
 ► Recognize the different credential titles (LVT, RVT, CVT) and what they signify for veterinary support staff.
 ► See how meeting these requirements establishes trust and expertise, ensuring high-quality animal care.

snippet.title: DIAMOND Antenna製 7MHzモービルアンテナ『HF 40CL』で悩む・・・💦【アマチュア無線】
snippet.description:
DIAMOND Antenna社製 7MHzモービルホイップアンテナ『HF 40CL』を頂いたのだが、なかなかSWRが下がらず苦戦・・・💦
たまたま手持ちにあった、同じくDIAMOND社製の「HV5S」の基台部分を移植したらうまくSWRが下がった。
果たしてこれで使えるのか・・・？？？
